name: Five Nights at Thomas's 2
description: Welcome to the new Thomas's Pizza Railway! We now have more trains, doors cameras, pizzas, Thomases, ect. We have also relocated to Canada after some "incidents" at the old location. But at least pizza is now only $4.99! Also PRO TIP TIMES! The trains bang on the door when the leave! Also the camera cuts out for a second when one moves.
